effect.name: VR360 Cap Top and Bottom
effect.description: Attempts to fill in zenith and nadir by stretching and blurring the image data. It samples a band of latitude near the start of the effect and stretches and blurs it over the pole.
effect.author: Leo Sutic

parameter.name: Interpolation
parameter.comment: Determines the sampling method.

parameter.name: Top Enabled
parameter.comment: Enables parameters for top portion

parameter.name: --Top-- Start
parameter.comment:
Degrees from the horizon
where we start to fill in

parameter.name: End
parameter.comment:
Degrees from the horizon
where we reach maximum blur

parameter.name: Blend In
parameter.comment: Degrees towards the horizon to sample from

parameter.name: Blend Out
parameter.comment: Degrees away from the horizon to sample to

parameter.name: Fade In
parameter.comment: Degrees to fade the effect in over

parameter.name: Blur width at start
parameter.comment: Horizontal angle to blur over at the start of the fill-in

parameter.name: Blur width at end
parameter.comment: Horizontal angle to blur over at the end of the fill-in

parameter.name: Blur height at start
parameter.comment: Vertical angle to blur over at the start of the fill-in

parameter.name: Blur height at end
parameter.comment: Vertical angle to blur over at the end of the fill-in

parameter.name: Bottom Enabled
parameter.comment: comment

parameter.name: --Bottom-- Start
parameter.comment: Degrees from the horizon where we start to fill in

parameter.name: End
parameter.comment: Degrees from the horizon where we reach maximum blur

parameter.name: Blend In
parameter.comment: Degrees towards the horizon to sample from

parameter.name: Blend Out
parameter.comment: Degrees away from the horizon to sample to

parameter.name: Fade In
parameter.comment: Degrees to fade the effect in over

parameter.name: Blur width at start
parameter.comment: Horizontal angle to blur over at the start of the fill-in

parameter.name: Blur width at end
parameter.comment: Horizontal angle to blur over at the end of the fill-in

parameter.name: Blur height at start
parameter.comment: Vertical angle to blur over at the start of the fill-in

parameter.name: Blur height at end
parameter.comment: Vertical angle to blur over at the end of the fill-in
